SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwMTAdvancementQuestScript


; For the purposes of determining Skills in this Script, the Secondary Skills are ignored.  They are a joke and not worth the added complexity

; 0 = Associate			    0 MTReputation,	Speed 30, Agility 30
; 1 = Blind Thrall		  10 MTReputation,	Speed 30, Agility 30, One Skill at 10
; 2 = Thrall				  20 MTReputation,	Speed 30, Agility 30, One Skill at 20
; 3 = White Thrall		  30 MTReputation,	Speed 30, Agility 30, One Skill at 30 + Two Skills at   5
; 4 = Thinker			  40 MTReputation,	Speed 30, Agility 30, One Skill at 40 + Two Skills at 10
; 5 = Brother			  50 MTReputation,	Speed 31, Agility 31, One Skill at 50 + Two Skills at 15
; 6 = Knower			  60 MTReputation,	Speed 32, Agility 32, One Skill at 60 + Two Skills at 20
; 7 = Master				  80 MTReputation,	Speed 33, Agility 33, One Skill at 70 + Two Skills at 25
; 8 = Exalted Master	100 MTReputation,	Speed 34, Agility 34, One Skill at 80 + Two Skills at 30
; 9 = Grandmaster		125 MTReputation,	Speed 35, Agility 35, One Skill at 90 + Two Skills at 35

; Morag Tong = Acrobatics, Illusion, Acrobatics, Sneak, Blade, LightArmor

SHORT MTAdvancement
; 0 = Nothing Qualifies
; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not
; 3 = Qualified For Advancement
; 4 = Script Needs To Set Next Rank
; 5 = No More Advancement

SHORT MTReputation

SHORT QualifyReputation
SHORT QualifySkills

short ExpelledOnce

float fQuestDelayTime

BEGIN GameMode

	if (fQuestDelayTime != 0.5)
		set fQuestDelayTime to 0.5
	endif
	
	if PlayerInMorrowind == 0
		return	;there really is no need to run this in Cyrodiil
	endif

	If Player.GetInFaction 0MoragSTong == 0
		return
	endif

;This part of the script handles expulsion

	If Player.GetInFaction 0MoragSTong
		If GetPCFactionSteal 0MoragSTong
			if eval (Call mwGetFactionWitnessesFunc 0MoragSTong)
				SetPCExpelled 0MoragSTong 1
				MessageBox "You have been expelled from Morag Tong."
				AddTopic 1makeSamends
			else
				SetPCFactionSteal 0MoragSTong 0
			endif
		EndIf

		If GetPCFactionAttack 0MoragSTong
			if eval (Call mwGetFactionWitnessesFunc 0MoragSTong)
				SetPCExpelled 0MoragSTong 1
				MessageBox "You have been expelled from Morag Tong."
				AddTopic 1makeSamends
			else
				SetPCFactionAttack 0MoragSTong 0
			endif
		EndIf

	EndIf

;The rest of the script below handles skill checks and advancement

	SET QualifyReputation TO 0
	SET QualifySkills TO 0

	IF MTAdvancement == 4 ; Need To Set Next Rank
		IF GetStage fbmwMTAdvancement == 10
			SetStage fbmwMTAdvancement 11
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMTAdvancement == 20
			SetStage fbmwMTAdvancement 21
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMTAdvancement == 30
			SetStage fbmwMTAdvancement 31
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMTAdvancement == 40
			SetStage fbmwMTAdvancement 41
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMTAdvancement == 50
			SetStage fbmwMTAdvancement 51
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMTAdvancement == 60
			SetStage fbmwMTAdvancement 61
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMTAdvancement == 70
			SetStage fbmwMTAdvancement 71
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMTAdvancement == 80
			SetStage fbmwMTAdvancement 81
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMTAdvancement == 90
			SetStage fbmwMTAdvancement 91
			SET MTAdvancement TO 5
			RETURN
		ENDIF

		SET MTAdvancement TO 0
; Continue processing to see if player can advance multiple ranks		
;		RETURN
	ENDIF ; MTAdvancement == 4

	IF MTAdvancement == 3 || MTAdvancement == 5
		RETURN
	ENDIF



	IF GetStage fbmwMTAdvancement < 10 && Player.GetFactionRank 0MoragSTong == 0
		IF MTReputation >= 10
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 10 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 10 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 10 || Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 10 || Player.GetAV Sneak >= 10 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 10
			SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
		ENDIF

		IF QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwMTAdvancement 10
			SET MTAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMTAdvancement < 20 && Player.GetFactionRank 0MoragSTong == 1
		IF MTReputation >= 20
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Speed >= 30 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 20 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 20 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 20 || Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 20 || Player.GetAV Sneak >= 20 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 20
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwMTAdvancement 20
			SET MTAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMTAdvancement < 30 && Player.GetFactionRank 0MoragSTong == 2
		IF MTReputation >= 30
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Speed >= 30 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 30 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 30 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 30 || Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 30 || Player.GetAV Sneak >= 30 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 30
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwMTAdvancement 30
			SET MTAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMTAdvancement < 40 && Player.GetFactionRank 0MoragSTong == 3
		IF MTReputation >= 40
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Speed >= 30 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 40 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 40 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 40 || Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 40 || Player.GetAV Sneak >= 40 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 40
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwMTAdvancement 40
			SET MTAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMTAdvancement < 50 && Player.GetFactionRank 0MoragSTong == 4
		IF MTReputation >= 50
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Speed >= 31 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 31
			IF Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 50 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 50 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 50 || Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 50 || Player.GetAV Sneak >= 50 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 50
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwMTAdvancement 50
			SET MTAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMTAdvancement < 60 && Player.GetFactionRank 0MoragSTong == 5
		IF MTReputation >= 60
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Speed >= 32 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 32
			IF Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 60 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 60 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 60 || Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 60 || Player.GetAV Sneak >= 60 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 60
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwMTAdvancement 60
			SET MTAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMTAdvancement < 70 && Player.GetFactionRank 0MoragSTong == 6
		IF MTReputation >= 80
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Speed >= 33 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 33
			IF Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 70 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 70 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 70 || Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 70 || Player.GetAV Sneak >= 70 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 70
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwMTAdvancement 70
			SET MTAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMTAdvancement < 80 && Player.GetFactionRank 0MoragSTong == 7
		IF MTReputation >= 100
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Speed >= 34 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 34
			IF Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 80 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 80 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 80 || Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 80 || Player.GetAV Sneak >= 80 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 80
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwMTAdvancement 80
			SET MTAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwMTAdvancement < 90 && Player.GetFactionRank 0MoragSTong == 8
		IF MTReputation >= 125
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Speed >= 35 && Player.GetAV Agility >= 35
			IF Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 90 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 90 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 90 || Player.GetAV Acrobatics >= 90 || Player.GetAV Sneak >= 90 || Player.GetAV LightArmor >= 90
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwMTAdvancement 90
			SET MTAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ENDIF


; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not

	IF QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET MTAdvancement TO 0
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET MTAdvancement TO 1
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 1
		SET MTAdvancement TO 2
	ENDIF
END ; GameMode
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 3298 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
